task.summary: Default task
Made table heading normal case again
Made table heading normal case again
Made .product heading font smaller
Cleaned up machine names with JS, anything in brackets get's moved to a mini-description
Cleaned up machine names with JS, anything in brackets get's moved to a mini-description
Changed category machines to parts & accessories
Fixed issue with edit address fields clearing each other ( not being in 3 columns )
Fixed issue with users being asked if they want to log out again when logging in after logging out.
Think we're all done! just made some minor changed to the smoothstate initiate script and that's all! ( still waiting for the Firefox back buttons to be fixed though )
Styled category page next/previous buttons
Removed Livereload Script
Updated to new style loading animation ( used by jQuery SmoothState ) and added headroom.js which hides the header when the user scrolls down the page ( and shows it again when they scroll back up! )
Removed REST API test
Changed front-page not logged in content to include opening times and contact details.
Removed headroom.js
Removed headroom.js
Home product search now works with title and new loop containing product groups instead of machines
Home product search now works with title and new loop containing product groups instead of machines
Updated jQuery SmoothState, this fixed pushState issues in Firefox
Added cart totals to upper header, it hides when user is not logged in in.
Moved vendor dependencies to bower.
Tweaked user new account email so that they know we are setting there account up for them prior the them using it
FIX: No options selected alert now appears again!
NEW: Added continue shopping button to "product added to cart" alert
NEW: Made a product loop that stores compatible machines/groups as data options. FIX: Fixed the product search, filter by machine and filter by category JS to work with the new loop.
FIX: Add all vendor assets to Git
IMPROVEMENTS: Product loop and stuff
NEW: Lightbox on single-product template
IMPROVEMENTS: Category page now works with new product loop
IMPROVEMENTS: Single product page style changes, added featured image adn lightbox as well

MESSAGE.value: Made .product heading font smaller
Cleaned up machine names with JS, anything in brackets get's moved to a mini-description
Changed category machines to parts & accessories
Fixed issue with edit address fields clearing each other ( not being in 3 columns )
Fixed issue with users being asked if they want to log out again when logging in after logging out.

Added cart totals to upper header, it hides when user is not logged in in.
Moved vendor dependencies to bower.
Tweaked user new account email so that they know we are setting there account up for them prior the them using it

NEW: Added continue shopping button to "product added to cart" alert
NEW: Made a product loop that stores compatible machines/groups as data options. FIX: Fixed the product search, filter by machine and filter by category JS to work with the new loop.
FIX: Add all vendor assets to Git

NEW: Lightbox on single-product template
IMPROVEMENTS: Category page now works with new product loop
